Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:.*)([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:=+\/\-@%]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:=+\/\-@%]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Rules.description: A list of lifecycle rules for individual objects in an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.
Rules.markdownDescription:
A list of lifecycle rules for individual objects in an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LifecycleConfiguration.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Rule.description: Specifies lifecycle rules for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket. You must specify at least one of the following: AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload, ExpirationDate, ExpirationInDays.

Status.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Conditional  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Enabled | Disabled  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.description: Unique identifier for the lifecycle rule. The value can't be longer than 255 characters.
Id.markdownDescription:
Unique identifier for the lifecycle rule. The value can't be longer than 255 characters.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload.description: Specifies a lifecycle rule that stops incomplete multipart uploads to an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.
AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload.markdownDescription:
Specifies a lifecycle rule that stops incomplete multipart uploads to an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

ExpirationDate.description: Indicates when objects are deleted from Amazon S3Outposts. The date value must be in ISO 8601 format. The time is always midnight UTC.
ExpirationDate.markdownDescription:
Indicates when objects are deleted from Amazon S3Outposts. The date value must be in ISO 8601 format. The time is always midnight UTC.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

ExpirationInDays.description: Indicates the number of days after creation when objects are deleted from Amazon S3Outposts.
ExpirationInDays.markdownDescription:
Indicates the number of days after creation when objects are deleted from Amazon S3Outposts.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Filter.description: The container for the filter of the lifecycle rule.

Prefix.description: Object key prefix that identifies one or more objects to which this rule applies.
Prefix.markdownDescription:
Object key prefix that identifies one or more objects to which this rule applies.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: Specifies a tag used to identify a subset of objects for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.
Tag.markdownDescription:
Specifies a tag used to identify a subset of objects for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

AndOperator.description: The container for the AND condition for the lifecycle rule. A combination of Prefix and 1 or more Tags OR a minimum of 2 or more tags.
AndOperator.markdownDescription:
The container for the AND condition for the lifecycle rule. A combination of Prefix and 1 or more Tags OR a minimum of 2 or more tags.

---

Required: Conditional  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Filter.markdownDescription:
The container for the filter of the lifecycle rule.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Rule.markdownDescription:
Specifies lifecycle rules for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket. You must specify at least one of the following: AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload, ExpirationDate, ExpirationInDays.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

iso8601UTC.description: The date value in ISO 8601 format. The timezone is always UTC. (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)
iso8601UTC.markdownDescription:
The date value in ISO 8601 format. The timezone is always UTC. (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ)

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^([0-2]\d{3})-(0[0-9]|1[0-2])-([0-2]\d|3[01])T([01]\d|2[0-4]):([0-5]\d):([0-6]\d)((\.\d{3})?)Z$  
Update requires: No interruption

AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload.description: Specifies the days since the initiation of an incomplete multipart upload that Amazon S3Outposts will wait before permanently removing all parts of the upload.

DaysAfterInitiation.description: Specifies the number of days after which Amazon S3Outposts aborts an incomplete multipart upload.
DaysAfterInitiation.markdownDescription:
Specifies the number of days after which Amazon S3Outposts aborts an incomplete multipart upload.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

AbortIncompleteMultipartUpload.markdownDescription:
Specifies the days since the initiation of an incomplete multipart upload that Amazon S3Outposts will wait before permanently removing all parts of the upload.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

FilterPrefix.description: Prefix identifies one or more objects to which the rule applies.
FilterPrefix.markdownDescription:
Prefix identifies one or more objects to which the rule applies.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

FilterTag.description: Tag used to identify a subset of objects for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:=+\/\-@%]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:=+\/\-@%]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

FilterTag.markdownDescription:
Tag used to identify a subset of objects for an Amazon S3Outposts bucket.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Prefix.description: Prefix identifies one or more objects to which the rule applies.

Tags.description: All of these tags must exist in the object's tag set in order for the rule to apply.

BucketName.markdownDescription:
A name for the bucket.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: (?=^.{3,63}$)(?!^(\d+\.)+\d+$)(^(([a-z0-9]|[a-z0-9][a-z0-9\-]*[a-z0-9])\.)*([a-z0-9]|[a-z0-9][a-z0-9\-]*[a-z0-9])$)  
Update requires: Replacement

OutpostId.description: The id of the customer outpost on which the bucket resides.
OutpostId.markdownDescription:
The id of the customer outpost on which the bucket resides.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(op-[a-f0-9]{17}|\d{12}|ec2)$  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this S3Outposts bucket.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this S3Outposts bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

LifecycleConfiguration.description: Rules that define how Amazon S3Outposts manages objects during their lifetime.
LifecycleConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Rules that define how Amazon S3Outposts manages objects during their lifetime.

---

Required: No  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the specified bucket.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[^:]+:s3-outposts:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:outpost\/[^:]+\/bucket\/[^:]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
